attributes.action: Stop all uk support to Syrian Freedom fighters.
attributes.background: The Syrian unrest came from US plans for a pipe line through Syria and nothing to do with humanitarian reasons. The U.K. Needs to back out of this illegal action and stand for peace.

rejection.details: We're not sure which groups you would like the UK to stop supporting, or what support you are referring to. If you could make your request more specific, we could look at this again.
